name: Slotventures - Fantasy Casino
description:
Start your own slot adventure in the fantasy world. Guardian Fairy will guide your way!

Full of new slot games with various fun mini bonus games.

Don't miss out on huge bonuses and freebies every day!

We guarantee that you’ve never seen slots like this game before.

The Most Generous Bonuses! Tired of running out of coins on other free slots?

Slotventures gives you various bonuses so you can keep spinning and make progress in the game.

You can enjoy;
- Huge payouts and Big Wins
- 20,000,000 free coins welcome bonus
- 50,000,000 for inviting friends to play slots
- Super hourly and daily bonuses, including the Bonus 777, Daily Spin, and Dice Challenge
- Earn bonus coins from Facebook Fan page
- Exciting adventure in various fantasy themes
- More mega bonuses as you play all our free casino slot machines!

Slotventures is intended for an adult audience only and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
